alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 7:01PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF EASTERN GREENE...WESTERN COLUMBIA...WESTERN GREENE...AND EASTERN ULSTER COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 659 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Prattsville to near Catskill and moving southeast at 30 MPH. THESE SNOW SHOWERS SNOW WILL BE NEAR...Catskill around 705 PM EST. North-South Lake Campground around 710 PM EST. Livingston and Claverack-Red Mills around 715 PM EST. Clermont around 725 PM EST. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 20 and 21. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Greene
